
    


int __init mxcfb_init(void)
{
	...
	ret =  platform_driver_register(&mxcfb_driver);
	...
}

static struct platform_driver mxcfb_driver = {
	.driver = {
		   .name = MXCFB_NAME,
		   },
	.probe = mxcfb_probe,
	.remove = mxcfb_remove,
	.suspend = mxcfb_suspend,
	.resume = mxcfb_resume,
};

static int mxcfb_probe(struct platform_device *pdev) // mxc_ipuv3_fb.c
  -> mxcfb_setup 		// mxc_ipuv3_fb.c
     -> fb_find_mode		// modedb.c
        -> fb_find_mode_cvt	// fbcvt.c
           -> fb_cvt_print_name	// fbcvt.c
